title: The Event
overview: The Event gives an unprecedented look behind the scenes of the extraordinary events created by Wolfgang Puck Catering and legendary restaurateur Wolfgang Puck. Each episode will follow various members of Puck's team as they strive to amaze clients and surpass even the highest expectations. With events like the Academy Awards(R) Oscars Party to the 10,000 guest Adobe MAXBash under their belts, the sky's the limit for this impressive team.
